summary: The video features text overlays detailing a personal story about a spouse who was brought to the USA unlawfully at age 4, became a "DREAMER" at 19, married in 2017, and had a daughter in 2020. In May 2022, the spouse left the USA for a consulate appointment but was denied. After 24.5 years in the USA, they now live in Mexico. The creator continues to live in the USA with their daughter but travels to Mexico every 4-8 weeks to see their spouse. The video shows a woman packing a suitcase on a bed. The spoken audio, a voiceover, is in English and has a sad and frustrated tone, discussing the emotional toll of the separation and the challenges of the spouse's immigration status. The voiceover also mentions "packing because my spouse was brought to the USA unlawfully at age 4. He became a DREAMER at age 19. We got married in 2017. We had our daughter in 2020. On May 2022 he left the USA for his consulate appointment. He was denied. After 24.5 years of living in the USA, he now lives in Mexico. I continued my life in the USA with our daughter, but travel down every 4-8 weeks to see him."
keywords: spouse, USA, unlawfully, DREAMER, married, daughter, consulate appointment, denied, Mexico, travel, packing, suitcase, separation, immigration
